page_content: The page discusses biodiversity contributions in agriculture in the Canton of Aargau.
The page provides information on regular testing in businesses as part of the Canton of Aargau's efforts to combat the COVID-19 pandemic.
The page discusses the use of LehrerOffice software for administrative tasks in primary schools in the Canton of Aargau.
The page discusses the transfer of ownership of publis, a company focused on software evaluation and development for municipalities, to the municipalities themselves.
The page discusses the efforts of the Civil Protection Service in the Canton of Aargau in dealing with the Covid-19 pandemic.
